title: The Bolton Factor, A Tragedy 1.28.20
itunes:title: The Bolton Factor, A Tragedy 1.28.20
description:
In episode 557, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian Eric Lampaert to discuss the 2020 Democratic candidates' celebrity crushes, what we learned from John Bolton's book, impeachment updates, televangelist Paula White, the tragic passing of Kobe Bryant, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. Do you have a celebrity crush?
  2. Bombshell book: What we know about John Bolton's allegations about Trump and Ukraine
  3. Trump was determining just how necessary US support was for Ukraine. He figured they'd give him *anything* in exchange for it.
  4. Paula White, Trump’s Personal Pastor, Joins the White House
  5. Civil rights groups wary of Trump's latest faith-based initiative
  6. Trump’s New ‘Religious Freedom’ Order Actually Undermines That Principle
  7. Why televangelist Paula White is the perfect Trump administration hire
  8. Did Trump’s Spiritual Adviser Ask People to Send Her Their January Salaries?
  9. Trump's spiritual adviser, Paula White, fires back at critics
  10. Trump’s “spiritual advisor” may as well be a Righteous Gemstones character 
  11. Kobe Bryant never stopped trying to inspire
  12. Kobe Bryant’s death: Live updates and remembrance
  13. WATCH: Sudan Archives - Iceland Moss | A COLORS SHOW

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
